name: Glenn the Alienn
description:
You'll embark on a voyage to stabilize various crystals around the galaxy in order to go back to the time when Glenn's house was still standing.

What ominous event has befallen Glenn? And most importantly, will you help this homeless alien to go back home?

CONTROLS

- W A S D or Left Analog - Movement

- Shift or LB/L1 - Run

- Space or Controller A/X - Jump

- E or Controller X/Square - Kick

- H or RB/R1 - Dance/Stop Dancing

- Mouse x or Right Analog - Camera Movement

GAMEPLAY NOTES

Find all the crystals hidden in the level to stabilize that world and advance to next one!

There are in total 3 mini-worlds + epilogue!

Apart from sound and character animations everything was done from scratch in the last 2 days!

CREDITS

- Andrea Di Bartolo > 3D Art - VFX - Game Design

- Samuele Padalino > Code - UI - Game Design

- Francesco Ramorino > Writer

- Music and Sound effects are from www.zapsplat.com

____________________________________________________________________________

IF YOU HAVE A WIDESCREEN YOU CAN PRESS "ALT + ENTER" TO CHANGE THE WINDOWED MODE OF THE GAME
